long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Profile Note Keeper allows you to effortlessly add personalized notes to any profile on X.com (formerly Twitter) and sync them across all your devices! Perfect for digital content creators, researchers, social media managers, and anyone who frequently analyzes profiles.

Features:
Personalized Notes: Add notes specific to each user profile, helping you keep track of important details, insights, and observations.
Cross-Device Sync: Your notes are automatically synced across all devices where you use Chrome, ensuring that your data is always up-to-date.
Easy Access: The "Add Note" button is seamlessly integrated into the profile interface, allowing you to quickly jot down thoughts without interrupting your workflow.
Minimalist Design: A clean and user-friendly interface that blends seamlessly with X.com, enhancing your browsing experience without any clutter.
Whether you’re researching influencers, managing client accounts, or just keeping track of interesting profiles, Profile Note Keeper simplifies your workflow by keeping all your notes organized and accessible.
